summary: A serial adventure writer with problems in his personal life lives out the adventures of his literary hero, King of Adventurers.
cast: Jet Li|Rosamund Kwan|Charlie Yeung|Takeshi Kaneshiro|Collin Chou|Kar-Ying Law|Billy Chow|Johnnie Kong|Kim-Fai Che|Ping Han|Yung-Chang Ho|Sam Kai-Sen Huang|Foo-Keung Kong|Kin-Yung Kwok|Wai-Ming Lam|Chi-Ming Lau|Tielian Liu|Siu-Ling Tsim|Ming-Kin Wong|Bing Lei Li
title: Mo him wong
